oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Supreme Court Case
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Memphis Park Commission; Supreme Court; law; segregation; civil rights;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Brief of Respondents in Opposition to Petition for Certiorari," I. A. Watson, et al v. the City of Memphis, a desegregation case focused on the Pink Palace and other park properties.
